name: Speedy Bois
description:
WASD or Arrow Keys to move, start the game, and reset the game.

This is my first attempt at enemy AI, so the enemy racecars aren't the best. Keeping track of who is in what place was also pretty challenging, and it may not be accurate 100% of the time.

It is possible to win all 3 races and get 22/22 points.

All code, art, music, and sounds by Asbestos Games.
